column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Very good overall.  We tried about 6-7 different things and all were quite good.  Red or Cava sangria were both delicious.  Recommend mixed green salad
column7: and the mushrooms stuffed with spinach and manchego cheese.  We had a ton of others that were all good and only one miss (chicken and chorizo skewer).  Service was great and they kept everything paced out nicely.  The Celtic coffee was very good.  Very crowded and reservations are definitely needed.
